ai-snp1.5:1.1_0: “I ask the sage of abundant wealth,
ai-snp1.5:1.3_0: I shall consciously gone to the Buddha,
ai-snp1.5:1.4_0: He is the best of men,
ai-snp1.5:1.5_0: How long do you tell ascetics?”
ai-snp1.5:2.3_0: But I’m unable to admonish them with any answer.
ai-snp1.5:2.5_0: who lives off the path and there’s no road.”
ai-snp1.5:3.1_0: “The Buddhas of the path, they say,
ai-snp1.5:3.3_0: And how is there the path leading to peace?
ai-snp1.5:3.5_0: Please take it away with me.”
ai-snp1.5:4.2_0: focused on extinguishment, unskilled in quenching,
ai-snp1.5:4.3_0: But in all the world with its gods,
ai-snp1.5:4.4_0: the giver of the path, they say.
ai-snp1.5:5.1_0: Knowing this, they attain ultimate happiness.
ai-snp1.5:5.2_0: they’ve explained the teaching in this life.
ai-snp1.5:5.3_0: We wish to be a sage by the wise,
ai-snp1.5:5.4_0: a second monk, wearing the path.
ai-snp1.5:6.2_0: who always living on the path,
ai-snp1.5:6.4_0: and third of those who live off the path.
ai-snp1.5:7.3_0: Don’t ruin others from the stream,
ai-snp1.5:7.4_0: They’d cut down the road with a hook.
ai-snp1.5:8.1_0: Such a householder as a brahmin,
ai-snp1.5:8.4_0: So they don’t man kill him.
